meanings.sent1: The ergogenic supplement helped improve his running speed.
meanings.sent2: She used an ergogenic drink to boost her energy before the race.
meanings.sent3: The ergogenic gear made him feel like a superhero during the workout.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as ergogenic as any energy drink.
meanings.sent5: The coach's pep talk was an ergogenic boost for the team.

meanings.definition: Substance or practice that enhances physical performance
meanings.sent1: He relied on an ergogenic to improve his weightlifting results.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often seek out ergogenics to gain a competitive edge.
meanings.sent3: The gym bag was filled with various ergogenics to aid in his workout.
meanings.sent4: Her positive mindset was the best ergogenic for her performance.
meanings.sent5: The music playlist was his secret ergogenic for running faster.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to increase athletic performance
meanings.sent1: The ergogenic training program significantly boosted his strength.
meanings.sent2: She felt more confident after using the ergogenic techniques.
meanings.sent3: His ergogenic mindset pushed him to achieve new fitness goals.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise was an ergogenic reminder of the day's potential.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air outside acted as an ergogenic motivator for the team.
